name: High Noon (itch) (johnrollz)
description: High Noon; A top down Multiplayer shooter, with a 8 bit art style designed to be easy on the eye and enjoyable to play. With controller only support it makes a perfect couch game to play with your mates. You and a friend are placed in a town with only your six shooter to settle the score use obsticles to take cover and manipulate the enemy.
